textBeforeTable: Table 27-25 Writable Elements for urn:oracle:webcenter:space:list:column Table 27-25 lists the writable elements for this resource. Writable Elements for column response - body: None request - body: None DELETE response - body: column request - body: column PUT response - body: column query parameters: None request - body: None GET The following methods are supported by this resource: Supported Methods for column column columns list lists resourceindex spaces resourceindex  This section shows how the client can navigate through the hypermedia to access this resource: Navigation Paths to column Use this resource type to identify the URI to use to view (GET), update (PUT), and delete (DELETE) a list column (list item detail). The response from a GET operation includes the specific column identified by the URI. The response from a PUT operation includes the modified version of the column identified by the URI. The response from a DELETE operation is a 204 status code. 27.3.4.13 urn:oracle:webcenter:space:list:column       urn:oracle:webcenter:space:list:column   urn:oracle:webcenter:space:list
